description: Global metrics registry for the AgentFarm analysis system

action_statistics.description: Overall action frequencies, per-action statistics, and most common actions

total_actions.name: total_actions
total_actions.description: Overall action frequency statistics across all steps

most_common_action.name: most_common_action
most_common_action.description: The most frequently occurring action type

most_common_frequency.name: most_common_frequency
most_common_frequency.description: Average frequency of the most common action

sequence_patterns.description: Action transition probabilities and common sequence patterns

decision_patterns.description: Success rates, decision consistency, and action diversity metrics

avg_success_rate.name: avg_success_rate
avg_success_rate.description: Average success rate across all decisions

success_trend.name: success_trend
success_trend.description: Trend in success rates over time

avg_action_diversity.name: avg_action_diversity
avg_action_diversity.description: Average number of different action types per step

diversity_trend.name: diversity_trend
diversity_trend.description: Trend in action diversity over time

reward_metrics.description: Reward distributions, trends, and performance metrics

avg_reward_variance.name: avg_reward_variance
avg_reward_variance.description: Average variance in rewards per action type

best_performing_action.name: best_performing_action
best_performing_action.description: Action type with highest average reward

best_action_reward.name: best_action_reward
best_action_reward.description: Average reward of the best performing action

success_rates.description: Success rates for different action types

action_success_rates.name: action_success_rates
action_success_rates.description: Success rates for each action type

action_sequences.description: Sequence length distributions and transition matrices

common_sequences.name: common_sequences
common_sequences.description: Count of common action sequence patterns

transition_matrix.name: transition_matrix
transition_matrix.description: Probabilities of transitioning between action types

agent_lifespan_analysis.description: Agent lifespan distributions and mortality patterns

mortality_rate.name: mortality_rate
mortality_rate.description: Rate of agent deaths per step

learning_performance.description: Overall learning performance trends and metrics

module_convergence_time.name: module_convergence_time
module_convergence_time.description: Time to convergence for each module

avg_convergence_step.name: avg_convergence_step
avg_convergence_step.description: Average step at which learning converges

population_dynamics.description: Population size and growth metrics over time

population_stability.name: population_stability
population_stability.description: Stability of population size (1.0 = perfectly stable)

agent_composition.description: Breakdown of agent types and their proportions

win_rate.name: win_rate
win_rate.description: Overall win rate across all combats

matchup_analysis.description: Combat outcomes by agent type matchups

matchup_win_rates.name: matchup_win_rates
matchup_win_rates.description: Win rates for specific agent type matchups

damage_ratios.name: damage_ratios
damage_ratios.description: Damage dealt vs received ratios by matchup

strategy_patterns.description: Combat strategy pattern detection and analysis

strategy_adaptability.name: strategy_adaptability
strategy_adaptability.description: How well strategies adapt to opponents

consumption_rate.name: consumption_rate
consumption_rate.description: Rate of resource consumption per step

consumption_trend.name: consumption_trend
consumption_trend.description: Trend in resource consumption over time

efficiency_metrics.description: Resource utilization efficiency by agent type

efficiency_by_type.name: efficiency_by_type
efficiency_by_type.description: Resource utilization efficiency by agent type

waste_ratio.name: waste_ratio
waste_ratio.description: Ratio of wasted to consumed resources

hotspot_persistence.name: hotspot_persistence
hotspot_persistence.description: How long hotspots persist over time

spatial_distribution.description: Spatial distribution and clustering of agents

territory_coverage.name: territory_coverage
territory_coverage.description: Fraction of space covered by movement

territorial_analysis.description: Territorial behavior and space usage analysis

trend_r_squared.name: trend_r_squared
trend_r_squared.description: Goodness of fit for trend line (0-1)

periodicity_analysis.description: Detection of periodic patterns and cycles

memory_length.name: memory_length
memory_length.description: Length of temporal memory in the system

change_point_detection.description: Detection of significant changes in time series

change_point_locations.name: change_point_locations
change_point_locations.description: Step numbers where changes were detected

tags.frequency: Related to action frequencies and counts
tags.trend: Temporal trends and changes over time
tags.actions: Metrics from the Actions analysis module
tags.agents: Metrics from the Agents analysis module
tags.learning: Metrics from the Learning analysis module
tags.population: Metrics from the Population analysis module
tags.combat: Metrics from the Combat analysis module
tags.resources: Metrics from the Resources analysis module
tags.spatial: Metrics from the Spatial analysis module
tags.temporal: Metrics from the Temporal analysis module
